about_the_game:
This pack contains 7 visuals based on oscilloscopes and spectrums.

The visuals are the following:
  • Space Spectrum: (by community member Noodles) is a mix of circular spectrum analyzer, a specially designed star field and a particle beam in the middle.
  • 3D Oscilloscope: Multiple oscilloscope rings forming a cool 3D shape.
  • Polar Bar Eclipse: The sound wave expressed as colored bars. For higher frequencies there is an "ear" outside which contrasts very well with the base effect.
  • Polar Spectrum Analyzer: Dual slowly rotating circular spectrum analyzers.
  • Polar Oscilloscope Wave: A circular wave being drawn into, almost like water.
  • Spectrum Analyzer: 2-colored spectrum analyzer with cross-colored dots on top.
  • Bare Polar Oscilloscope: Just the polar oscilloscope. Is cool on its own but perhaps more useful if you want to record it and use it in a video or as a layer in a streaming setup.
detailed_description:
This pack contains 7 visuals based on oscilloscopes and spectrums.

The visuals are the following:
  • Space Spectrum: (by community member Noodles) is a mix of circular spectrum analyzer, a specially designed star field and a particle beam in the middle.
  • 3D Oscilloscope: Multiple oscilloscope rings forming a cool 3D shape.
  • Polar Bar Eclipse: The sound wave expressed as colored bars. For higher frequencies there is an "ear" outside which contrasts very well with the base effect.
  • Polar Spectrum Analyzer: Dual slowly rotating circular spectrum analyzers.
  • Polar Oscilloscope Wave: A circular wave being drawn into, almost like water.
  • Spectrum Analyzer: 2-colored spectrum analyzer with cross-colored dots on top.
  • Bare Polar Oscilloscope: Just the polar oscilloscope. Is cool on its own but perhaps more useful if you want to record it and use it in a video or as a layer in a streaming setup.
name: VZX Player - Spectrums and Oscilloscopes

package_groups.name: default
package_groups.title: Buy VZX Player - Spectrums and Oscilloscopes

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel i3 dual core or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia or AMD OpenGL 2.x GPU (intel HD graphics not supported!)
  • Storage: 20 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Soundcard is required
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel i3 quad core or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 5xx+ or AMD GPU
  • Storage: 20 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Soundcard is required

short_description: 7 beautiful Spectrums and Oscilloscopes for VSXu Player.
